General.Name: PT Toba Surimi Industries Tbk
General.Description: PT Toba Surimi Industries Tbk engages in the seafood processing business in Indonesia. The company offers pasteurized products, including jumbo lump, super lump, special, claw, and cocktail claw products; and canned and frozen products, such as fish, cephalopods, shellfish, value-added, and seafood mix products. It sells its products in the United States, the European community, Japan, Hong Kong, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Australia. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Deli Serdang, Indonesia.PT Toba Surimi Industries Tbk operates as a subsidiary of National Corporation.
